mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM cc_user_role ur LEFT JOIN cc_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN cc_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type IN ('C','F') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0;
SELECT DISTINCT IFNULL(m.perms,'') FROM cc_menu m WHERE m.menu_type IN ('F','C') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0;

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM cc_menu m WHERE m.menu_type IN ('C','M') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num;

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM cc_user_role ur LEFT JOIN cc_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN cc_menu m ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type IN ('C','M') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num;
